label: HandlePic4Turtle
m: Pic4Turtle is a social platform about sea turtles and environmental awareness.
My job was focused on classifying sea turtle species in pictures.
I tackled the problem using deep learning (convolutional neural networks) to transform images and make them easier to classify.
Using a pretty challenging dataset, with real-world pictures, the model achieved optimal results (nearly 90% accuracy).
Are you interested in machine learning too?
Why don't you drop me a line or write down your email address?
